name: Depths of Endor
storyline:
In the shadowy depths beneath the land of Endor, ancient dragons lie in wait, each guarding a labyrinth of peril. Their master, "Mordoth: Lord of the Abyss", an all-powerful Dragon Lord, commands them, growing stronger with every soul that dares to enter his domain. Legends speak of a group of heroes brave enough to venture through the dungeon floors, defeat the dragon guardians, and challenge the tyrant that controls them all.

Your journey begins now—descend into the abyss, face the fire-breathing beasts, and reclaim Endor from the grip of terror. Will you conquer the depths or become another tale of defeat?
summary: Classic, turn-based dungeon crawler RPG. A retro-styled adventure that combines the best elements of old-school role-playing games with modern features of a roguelike.
